Literature.Title: Human microbiome derived synthetic antimicrobial peptides with activity against Gram-negative, Gram-positive, and antibiotic resistant bacteria
Literature.Author: Mousa WK, Shaikh AY, Ghemrawi R, Aldulaimi M, Al Ali A, Sammani N, Khair M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.1µM),Clostridioides difficile ATCC 43602(MIC=2.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus BAA-2313(MIC=2.9µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC BAA-2317(MIC=3.2µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 15313(MIC=2.6µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 33694(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-1744(no activity data),Salmonella enterica subsp. arizonae ATCC 13314(no activity data)
